text: Jean-Claude Fruteau (6 June 1947 – 28 April 2022) was a French politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament for France's "outre mer" from 1999 to 2007. He was a member of the Socialist Party, which was part of the Party of European Socialists. Fruteau was a member of the National Assembly from 2007 until 2017. He was also Mayor of Saint-Benoît, Réunion from 2008 until his death. Fruteau died on 28 April 2022 at the age of 74.Figure de la politique locale, Jean-Claude Fruteau, ancien maire de Saint-Benoît est décédé ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors
title: Jean-Claude Fruteau
